item.description:
"One of the best days of the year is rapidly approaching, the AFL Grand Final. As we do every year, the Boston Demons are showing a game replay at 2pm on Saturday the 29th of September. The game will be shown on 2 big screens at Tommy Doyles in KENDALL SQUARE, Cambridge. Note this is NOT the same place as the last two years which was Harvard Square. The Kendall Square location is a stumbling distance away from the Kendall/MIT Red Line stop. Use the address 1 Kendall Square, Cambridge for directions."

See http://www.bostondemo... for more details

This was a really fun day last year, I would highly recommend it to everyone. See you there.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Demons event: AFL grand final day party
